turns.content: I'm trying to recall some movies I've watched recently, can you help me keep track of them?

I'd be happy to help you keep track of the movies you've watched recently. You can tell me the titles of the movies you've seen, and I'll keep a list for you. If you don't remember the exact title, feel free to give me any details you do remember (e.g. genre, actors, plot points, etc.) and I can try to help you figure out what it might be.

Let's get started! What's the first movie you'd like to add to the list?
I think I watched Avengers: Endgame last weekend with my family, and before that, I saw Joker with friends at the cinema about three weeks ago.

I've added those two movies to your list:

1. Avengers: Endgame (2019)
2. Joker (2019)

Let me know when you're ready to add more movies to the list. Do you remember anything else you've watched recently, or would you like to stop there for now?
I also watched Stranger Things season 3 on Netflix, and I remember watching Toy Story 4 at the cinema with my niece and nephew last month.

I've added those to your list:

1. Avengers: Endgame (2019)
2. Joker (2019)
3. Stranger Things (Season 3) (2019)
4. Toy Story 4 (2019)

I'll note that Stranger Things is a TV series, not a movie, but I've included it in your list since you mentioned it. Let me know if you'd like to separate your movie and TV show lists in the future.

Keep going! What else have you watched recently?
I also watched Spider-Man: Far From Home at home, and Captain Marvel with my sister a few months ago.

I've added those to your list:

1. Avengers: Endgame (2019)
2. Joker (2019)
3. Stranger Things (Season 3) (2019)
4. Toy Story 4 (2019)
5. Spider-Man: Far From Home (2019)
6. Captain Marvel (2019)

You've had a pretty Marvel-ous few months, haven't you? Let me know if there are any other movies or shows you'd like to add to your list!
What about When They See Us, the miniseries on Netflix? I finished watching that recently too.

I've added it to your list:

1. Avengers: Endgame (2019)
2. Joker (2019)
3. Stranger Things (Season 3) (2019)
4. Toy Story 4 (2019)
5. Spider-Man: Far From Home (2019)
6. Captain Marvel (2019)
7. When They See Us (Miniseries) (2019)

You've got a great mix of blockbusters, critically-acclaimed dramas, and popular TV shows on your list! Keep 'em coming, and I'll keep track of them for you.
I also watched The Princess Bride at an outdoor movie screening in the park with colleagues from work.

A classic! I've added it to your list:

1. Avengers: Endgame (2019)
2. Joker (2019)
3. Stranger Things (Season 3) (2019)
4. Toy Story 4 (2019)
5. Spider-Man: Far From Home (2019)
6. Captain Marvel (2019)
7. When They See Us (Miniseries) (2019)
8. The Princess Bride (1987)

It's great that you got to enjoy a beloved film in a unique setting with your colleagues! Outdoor movie screenings can be such a fun experience.

Let me know if there's anything else you'd like to add to your list. I'm all ears!
